My research investigates how different kinds of linguistic information—<strong>morphosyntactic structure</strong> and <strong>morphophonological form</strong>—are planned in production and retrieved during sentence processing, and how mismatches between them drive <strong>errors and create illusions</strong> in production and comprehension.
